entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is commentating as usual, naming the players with less than his usual gusto.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George had left, leaving Lee dispirited.

entities.name: bradley
entities.description: Bradley is a player in the game, mentioned by Lee Jordan during commentary.

entities.name: davies
entities.description: Davies is a Ravenclaw Captain and a player in the game, mentioned by Lee Jordan during commentary.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho walked out onto the pitch, her shiny black hair rippling in the slight breeze.

entities.name: roger davies
entities.description: Roger Davies is a player and chatting animatedly to Cho as they prepare to mount their brooms.

relationships.description: Lee Jordan is commentating, implying that Fred and George had left before the game started.
Davies has the Quaffle immediately after the teams zoomed out onto the pitches.
Davies dodges Johnson as he goes straight for goal.
Davies dodges Bell as he goes straight for goal.
Davies dodges Spinnet as he goes straight for goal.
